ComicInfo.Title: There's No One Else I'd Rather be Incinerated and Sent to Hell with Than You
ComicInfo.Summary: Marty and Alison face the supremely creepy Doctor Shiver! Escape from the subterranean skyscraper! Veronika brags about her allegiance to Satan!!! Bernice listens to her!!! Stunning PENULTIMATE EPISODE!!! Are you with us?! You better be because “There’s No One Else I’d Rather Be Incinerated and Sent to Hell with Than You”—that’s the title of the issue, BTW— is how we feel about you. From LIANA KANGAS (Star Wars Adventures, She Said Destroy) and SCOTT BRYAN WILSON (Batman: Gotham Nights, Altered Carbon, Pennyworth).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 10:28:43. [CVDB955803] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:23:59. [Issue ID 2452879]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Gab Contreras,Liana Kangas,Maria Llovet,Scott Bryan Wilson,Skylar Patridge
